## Third party updates

The following third party library updates have been made:

  - cli11 2.0.0
  - eigen 3.3.9
  - exodusII 2021-05-12
  - expat 2.4.1
  - freetype 2.11.0
  - glew 2.2.0
  - hdf5 1.12.1
  - jpeg 2.1.0
  - libxml2 2.9.12
  - lz4 1.9.3
  - lzma 5.2.5
  - mpi4py 3.0.3
  - netcdf 4.8.0
  - ogg 1.3.5
  - pugixml 1.11.4
  - sqlite 3.36.0
  - tiff 4.3.0
